pr_title: Modify the occasion of triggering listeners

timeline.bodyText: Why do we need to get the namespace policy from the DispatchRateLimiter? If we don't enable the dispatch rate limiter, is it possible to get the namespace policy?
timeline.author: codelipenghui

replies.bodyText: This is a static tool method, and has nothing to do with whether DispatchRateLimiter is enabled
